title: Amid labor strife, Google opposes shareholder call for whistleblower-policy review
text: In the past several months, the tech giant has seen some high-profile departures; faced a National Labor Relations Board complaint over terminations of employees involved in organizing; and had several hundred employees form a minority union.

title: Alphabet Reports Earnings Tuesday. Here Is What to Expect.
text: A powerful fourth-quarter has ratcheted up expectations.

title: The next tech hearing targets social media algorithms — and YouTube, for once
text: Another week another big tech hearing in Congress. With a flurry of antitrust reform bills on the way, Democratic lawmakers are again bringing in the some of the world's most powerful tech companies for questioning.

title: Google (Alphabet) Earnings: What to Look For
text: Google (Alphabet) (GOOGL) reports Q1 earnings after market close on April 27. Can it maintain robust growth in earnings and cloud revenue?

text: Wall Street investors share their expectations for names like Tesla, Alphabet and Facebook, which kick off a busy week of earnings.

title: Roku Battles Google Over YouTube TV
text: Roku claims Google has "monopoly power," but Roku has the leading market share in the streaming-TV platform space.

title: Roku may lose YouTube TV app over what it deems ‘anti-competitive' demands from Google
text: Roku Inc. warned Monday that users of its streaming products may lose access to the YouTube TV app due to a breakdown in negotiations with Alphabet Inc.'s Google.

title: Roku Threatens To Blackout YouTube TV Over Anticompetitive Dispute: Bloomberg
text: Roku Inc (NASDAQ: ROKU) has started intimating customers about losing access to Alphabet Inc's (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) YouTube TV app, signifying the latest deadlock between the companies, Bloomberg reports. Roku has alleged Google's biased and exploitative manipulation of its search results affecting data usage and cost, leading to the proposed changes.

title: Earnings Previews: Alphabet, AMD, Microsoft, Texas Instruments
text: A quick glance at the calendar for this week shows some 900 publicly traded companies are scheduled to report March quarter earnings this week.

title: Earnings Preview: Alphabet
text: Alphabet (NASDAQ:GOOGL) releases its next round of earnings this Tuesday, April 27. Here is Benzinga's essential guide to Alphabet's Q1 earnings report.

title: Alphabet CEO Pichai's base salary more than triples, but total compensation plunges to $7.4 million
text: Google parent Alphabet Inc. disclosed over the weekend that Chief Executive Sundar Pichai's base salary more than tripled to more than $2 million in 2020, but his total compensation plunged to just $7.43 million, as he received no stock awards. The internet giant disclosed in its 2020 proxy statement filed late Friday that Pichai's total compensation in 2020 included $2.02 million in base salary, up from $650,000 in 2019, and $5.41 million in "all other compensation," which included $5.4 million for personal security.
